name: Lorenzo the Runner
description:
Lorenzo the Runner" is a 2D Mario-like platformer that takes you on an exhilarating adventure through a vibrant cityscape

Lorenzo is an ambitious and vigorous gangster, who only cares about two things in life. Collecting money.... and looking sharp while doing it.

This youngster finds himself one day eager for a real adventure and sets out deep into a city known for all types of dangerous individuals and beasts. Whilst the average person would be scared easily and never set foot in this place, Lorenzo doesn't give a flying fig. This is what he lives for.

Join Lorenzo on this amazing journey!

Features
A variety of enemies
3 distinct environments are divided into 4 levels
Slick platforming controls
Cool beat playing in the background
